name: waterfront
description: A binary flag (1 if it has a waterfront view).

name: view
description: A rating from 0 to 4 of how good the view is.

name: condition
description: A rating from 1 to 5 on the overall condition.

name: grade
description: A rating from 1 to 13 on construction/design quality.

name: sqft_above
description: Square footage of living space above ground.

name: sqft_basement
description: Square footage of living space below ground.

name: yr_built
description: The year the house was built.

name: yr_renovated
description: The year the house was last renovated (0 if never).

name: sqft_living15
description: The average living space of the 15 nearest neighbors.

name: sqft_lot15
description: The average lot size of the 15 nearest neighbors.
